00035 CSwordModuleSearch* searcher = 0;
00036 
00037 void startSearchCallback(void *p){
00038     if (searcher)
00039         searcher->startSearch();
00040 }
00041 
00042 void percentUpdateDummy(char percent, void *p) {
00043     searcher->percentUpdate(percent, p);
00044 };
00045 
00046 CSwordModuleSearch::CSwordModuleSearch() :
00047     m_searchedText(QString::null),
00048     m_searchOptions(0),m_foundItems(false),m_isSearching(false),m_terminateSearch(false)
00049 {
00050     searcher = this;
00051 }
00052 
00053 CSwordModuleSearch::~CSwordModuleSearch(){
00054     searcher = 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void CSwordModuleSearch::percentUpdate(char percent, void *){
00058     cms_currentProgress = (int)percent;
00059     if (cms_module_count > 1)
00060       cms_overallProgress = (int)((float)((cms_module_current - 1)*100+cms_currentProgress))/cms_module_count;
00061     else
00062       cms_overallProgress = cms_currentProgress;
00063     m_updateSig.activate(); 
00064 }
00065 
00067 void CSwordModuleSearch::setModules( ListCSwordModuleInfo& list ) {
00068     m_moduleList = list;
00069 }
00070 
00072 const bool CSwordModuleSearch::startSearch() {
00073     backend()->setFilterOptions ( CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults() );   
00074     m_foundItems            = false;
00075     m_terminateSearch = false;
00076     m_isSearching       = true;     
00077         
00078     cms_currentProgress = 0;
00079     cms_overallProgress = 0;
00080     cms_module_current = 0;
00081     cms_module_count = m_moduleList.count();
00082     
00083     bool foundItems = false;
00084     
00085     for (m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current() && !m_terminateSearch; m_moduleList.next()) {
00086         cms_module_current++;
00087         if ( m_moduleList.current()->search(m_searchedText, m_searchOptions, m_searchScope, &percentUpdateDummy) )
00088             foundItems = true;
00089     }
00090     cms_currentProgress = 100;
00091     cms_overallProgress = 100;
00092     
00093     m_foundItems = foundItems;      
00094     m_isSearching = false;
00095     m_terminateSearch = false;
00096 
00097     m_finishedSig.activate();       
00098     return true;
00099 }
00100

00128 void CSwordModuleSearch::setSearchScope( ListKey scope ) {
00129     m_searchScope.copyFrom( scope );
00130 }
00131 
00133 void CSwordModuleSearch::resetSearchScope() {
00134     m_searchScope.ClearList();
00135 }
00136 
00138 void CSwordModuleSearch::interruptSearch() {
00139     if (m_isSearching)
00140         m_terminateSearch = true; //no other modules will be searched
00141     for (m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current(); m_moduleList.next())
00142         m_moduleList.current()->interruptSearch(); //interrupt the current module
00143 }

00156 const int CSwordModuleSearch::getPercent( percentType type ){
00157     switch (type) {
00158         case currentModule:
00159             return cms_currentProgress;
00160         case allModules:
00161             return cms_overallProgress;
00162 //      default:
00163 //          return 0;
00164     };
00165     return 0;
00166 }
